generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with a visible road surface, including a manhole cover, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, delineated by curbs and bordered by parked vehicles and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the street, providing shade and greenery.
- person: Two individuals are visible standing on the sidewalk near the left side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the street, including a dark-colored SUV and a silver sedan.
- motorcycle: A blue motorcycle is parked on the left side of the sidewalk, near the curb.
- bicycle: Multiple bicycles are parked along the sidewalk on both sides of the street.
- traffic sign: A pedestrian crossing sign is visible on the right side of the street, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- wall: A white wall is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
